reviews.review: Great Game. If someone played Half Life 2 and its episodes and wants to dive into the universe some more. I really recommend getting this game and even Opposing Force and Blue Shift. Very fun and emersive, just like any Valve game.
нестареющая класика
This is the best fps of the world... so you really should own it.
Believe the hype.

This action game is a must-play classic. Even if you've watched walkthroughs or speedruns, when you play it's a totally different experience. The level design, atmosphere and story plot never gets old. Consider the graphics was pretty much the most advanced in that time.
It's not the best FPS, albeit in the same way that the girl you met at the Hallowe'en party isn't really Catwoman.

Buy this. Even if you hate the game, there's so many feature-length mods out there that you can waste your weekend on. Now, ask any ol grease-dripper what the best game ever made is, and he'll likely tell you: "haph life" if not "haph liphe 2." 

you want my personal opinion? I love it, not because I'm a PC gaming shitlord who does whatever my favorite blogger tells me to, but because it's a chintzy late 90s murder simulator with wonderful, very potent art direction that I fresh squeeze inspiration from on an annual basis. 

But I'm no fool, this shit is definitely not for everyone. You may be inherently disgusted by the look and feel of this game. At first glance this thing looks like macaroni and broken crayons with guns in it. No dark angular metal bolted to grim military toughies with scary helmets and pouches a plenty. If that's your thing, check out Half-Life 2.
GET IT
This is a classic everyone should experience. It's fun to play this then go right into HL2.
IT GUD GAME!!!
Hell yes !

Truly a masterpiece, a beginning of a modding era and a new age of shooters, before there was Halo, Call of Duty, or any other modern mainstream game, there was Half life.(I never tried Half life: source so i can't really say much about it, yet it does have better graphics than the goldSource version.
You can't completely say you've played this game unless you've prevented the Resonance Cascade from ever happening by typing Impulse 101 and gunning down everybody in Sector C.

A Story Abought A Man Called Gorden Freeman Goes In A Awsome Adventure Filled With Action G-Man Watchs Is Every Move Get This Game Now And The Second And Make This Sad World Into A Great Happy World......

Half Life, the game that is regarded by many to be a perfect FPS. This is especially true for the time it was made. 

From the puzzles which are challenging, but not too challenging (Thanks to Valve and their excellent placement of lights and other objects that subtly cue you in) it feels really rewarding when you advance onwards.

You should expect to die many times, as you can be swarmed by multitudes of enemies if you don't start backpedelling around corners.  Oh, and a crowbar.

A major issue with the game is the sound system. Such as in the opening sequence when you're on the rail system. The slightest twitch and you can't hear what the announcer is saying, even though you are in the same position. 

However, this can be overlooked because there is not a lot of Dialouge and you're mainly whacking stuff with a crowbar.

This is an amazing FPS that has actually held up quite well in terms of gameplay since it was released. The graphics may seem clunky now, but the gameplay is good.

To wciąż solidny tytuł, z masą złożonych poziomów, rewelacyjnym dźwiękiem, klimatem, satysakcjonującym poziomem trudności i przeciwnikami, do których czuje się respekt (ot, choćby rybka ~~).

Warto zagrać, pomimo dziwnych rzeczy których od wielu lat w grach nie widziałem (jak półautomatyczne celowanie lub błędy w postaci wychodzenia poza mapę i blokowanie się)
Олдскульный вин

After FINALLY beating this game, I can safely say it's one of the greats. Very challenging game even to this day and on the lowest difficulty setting. They don't make games this long, let alone this good anymore. Multiplayer is fun with friends as well, all around great game even if it's a bit dated nowadays.

a classic game, full of excitement and intrigue, all layed nicely together by a phenominal storyline and crazily scary combat. A must have!

The best linear first person shooter of all time. Revolutionary, innovative, and with a fantastic modding community that has allowed the game to remain exciting and relevant over fifteen years after its release, it's hard to ask for more when looking to purchase a game. Whether you're braving the hallowed halls of the Black Mesa Research Facility for the 20th time, or enjoying one of it's critically acclaimed mods ranging from Counter-Strike 1.6, Team Fortress Classic, Ricochet, Natural Selection, SvenCo-op, and many more, this game will keep you entertained and begging for more thousands of hours later. A great start for a young company called Valve, and a taste of the fantastic quality that was to come from the designers of the Steam software we know and use today and so many other wonderful titles.

freeman gordon fuks da alesns

10/10
fucking sweet
Respect what made Valve famous.

The game that revolutionized story driven FPS games. Please play this. The graphics may not hold up to your standards anymore but the controls are still very fluid.
Whether you've played the second one or not, you'd be doing yourself a big favor by playing HL1.

The original freeman - One of the most difficult shooters that paved the highway for every story telling shooters that exist today. A must play if anyone claims to enjoy the FPS genre. Every event memorable, every event extremely difficult as it should be. No Nav points, no maps, just gordon your reactions intense thinking and a crowbar.
Half-Life is humouristic, immersive, clever, and solidly entertaining even today. A true FPS classic!
Nothing needs to be said about this classic.

FPS의 패러다임을 바꾼 중요한 기둥.
이전까지의 FPS는 단지 쏘고, 부수고, 특정한 스위치를 누르면 탄이 깨지는 구조였지만 하프라이프는 치밀한 시나리오, 로딩이 거의 없는 연결되는 스테이지, 환경사운드등을 동원해 게이머들에게 강렬한 경험을 남겼다. 이 작품 이후로 갑자기 FPS에 서사성이 강화되기 시작했다.

우주최강 공돌이와 빠루의 등장 역시 중요한데, 기본무기치고 말도안되는 데미지와 속도, 그리고 흉악한 타 FPS의 기본무기와 달리 "연장"이라는 것이 큰 임팩트를 남겼기 때문이다.
멀티에서 써보면 빠루들고 대쉬점프하는 상대방만큼 공포스러운게 없다.

Als Half-Life 1998 rauskam war es gegenüber den ganzen anderen Egoshootern beinahe eine Offenbarung in diesem Genre nun auch ein Spiel mit einer gescheiten, spannend präsentierten Geschichte zu haben. Die Portierung auf die Source-Engine hat der Optik gut getan - auch wenn sie nach heutigen Maßstäben natürlich keinen Blumentopf mehr gewinnt. Für mich ist Half-Life ein echter Meilenstein der Videospielgeschichte.

"Classics never get old". The original Half-Life was and IS one of the best games ever made thanks to the holy grail of gaming: engaging story and great gameplay. Telling the story of the Black Mesa Incident and it's aftermath trough the eyes of theorical psysicist Dr. Gordon Freeman, Valve's launch title revolutionizes the FPS genre focusing on story without sacrificing gameplay in a way few games have ever come close.
Forget about Freeman, we are cutting our losses and pulling out! Anybody left down there now is on his own, repeat, if you weren't already, you are now!
Just play it

Even after so many years, this game has a huge playabilty, the story will just make you follow this game and can say that is very well written. Finally managed to finish it. The game is amazing, yes some mini bugs in there about movement, but I have to say that the expansions blend so much with the original that you actually get to see something very familiar. I can say without playing the Half Life 2 series, that this is one of the top games I ever played even now at this moment. Be sure to check the series, is not just a shooter is way more.
